section.title: p:archive-manifest
section.para: The p:archive-manifest creates an XML manifest file describing the contents of the archive appearing on its source port.
The p:archive-manifest step inspects the archive appearing on its source port and outputs a manifest describing the contents of the archive on its result port.

The format of the archive can be specified using the format option. Implementations must support the format, specified with the value zip. It is implementation-defined what other formats are supported.

The parameters option can be used to supply parameters to control the archive manifest generation. The semantics of the keys and the allowed values for these keys are implementation-defined. It is a dynamic error if the map parameters contains an entry whose key is defined by the implementation and whose value is not valid for that key.

The generated archive has the format as described in . Implementations must supply an c:entry element and its name attribute for every entry in the archive. Supplying additional information is implementation-defined.
